caption: Great sangria to match the spirited staff!!

Homely is how I would describe the food. It feels very light and wholesome, like food made at home by the expert chef in your family. It does well on flavors with a great choice of ingredients. Patrons, please don't add hot sauce to any of the dishes.

We ordered a delightful Hanukkah spread from Pomella and it totally exceeded our expectations in all ways. All of the dishes we ordered were excellently prepared, packaged and following their instructions to reheat left us with a tasty meal …

I ordered online for a pickup. I got the iced coffee, the malabi (I have no idea what this is but I love the sound of something rose-tasting), and 2 types of baklava. The coffee was a nice afternoon pick-me-up with strong notes of cardamom. …
I constantly come grabbing some food in this place. I enjoyed the prompt service and well cooked dishes. Great work.

We ordered a delightful Hanukkah spread from Pomella and it totally exceeded our expectations in all ways. All of the dishes we ordered were excellently prepared, packaged and following their instructions to reheat left us with a tasty meal that was likely almost as good as eating there. The brisket tagine was standout.

We just loved our dinner, every component of it; from the delicious and savory brisket; the interesting fish cakes; the sublimely light matza balls in rich broth; the delicious pavlova and yummy matza toffee....on and on, all wonderful. You helped make our "Covid Passover" a little more joyful. Thanks to all the staff at Pomella!!!!
Good food. Outside dining only because of COVID-19. Metered parking lot

This review is for their desserts. I have had Pomella's back when it was further up Piedmont called Ba-Bite and will get a meal one day. I've been hankering for sweets since the days have been growing darker earlier. I ordered online for a …
Loved it here. So many good vegetarian options.
Order pick up. Easy parking, orderly process with friendly environment. Food is great.
Their food smells so good. I must try this restaurant
I am picky about felafel. They've got it down. Side sauces (shug, amba) so good (if you appreciate spice). Modern, fresh, creative and delicious salads. Good variety on the menu.

This place is an absolutely fantastic Middle Eastern restaurant. The staff is extremely friendly, both in person and over the phone. The place is nice and cozy, with heaters for when it’s cold outside. The food is incredibly flavorful. The …

We were huge fans of Ba-Bite so naturally had to check out this new venture.  Love the fantastic beer selection to start with, and they have a fantastic selection of snacks (love the Za'atar chips and hummus) we loved the selection of warm …
The saffron rice with salmon is so good! Staff is friendly, does a good job with COVID-19 procedures, and their outdoor tables look at least 6ft apart.

I was so satisfied with the service because your staves were so friendly and speedy. I can say that you trained them to become more attentive to what would be the customer needs. The food was also very delicious and had a very nice presentation. Great job, guys! You're highly recommended!
So tasty! Been twice and loved it equally each time.
It was good. A little over priced for the serving size. Area was clean and staff was nice.

I ordered online for a pickup. I got the iced coffee, the malabi (I have no idea what this is but I love the sound of something rose-tasting), and 2 types of baklava. The coffee was a nice afternoon pick-me-up with strong notes of cardamom. …

10/10 recommend Pomella :) My mom and I were looking for some comfort food after a trip to IKEA! The food was the freshest middle-eastern we have had in CA. Pleasing to the eye, mouth, and heart. Fresh, unique, satisfying salads and saffron …

We've ordered Pomella takeout (during COVID) at least 5 times now and every time it's amazing! The food is delicious and is always hot still after we bring it home, super friendly staff and just all around a great experience - will definitely keep enjoying Pomella and hope to eat there in-person soon!
The falafel cannot be beaten. They have true middle eastern food at this joint!

One of the best take-out options on the Avenue! I've become a fan of the lamb-kefta wrap: Buy  one in the afternoon and I'm pretty much set for the day, and it's completely dairy free! The majadra plate is also tasty. Make sure to get some …
Really good Middle Eastern food! We've been ordering / taking out from Pomela a few times lately and never been disappointed!

My family has savored several dinners from Pomella and they have been very enjoyable.  The meats are very tasty, the salad fresh and varied, the flavors clean.  Put these together with the creamy hummus, warm pitas and falafels and you have a filling and satisfying meal.  Also enjoyed the eggplant dish, very appetizing.

Got delivery during COVID and was very impressed. For the entree I had the saffron rice with kefta. The kefta itself was fantastic, with a really delicate texture that was almost fluffy. I think it was pine nuts that gave it its unique …
Wonderful fresh Mediterranean!  It always feels a little bit pricey, but we never regret anything we order. I especially recommend the tagines, butternut squash composed salad, and the lamb hummus.

The falafel wrap was delish- such a well made falafel. Spent all my money next-door at Dona which is a complete rip off. I am looking forward to trying more on the menu! Also got the fig cookies and they are DANK!

Pomella has become a semi-regular part of my WFH lunch rotation — I almost exclusively order the butternut squash + quinoa salad (that dressing!) or the falafel wrap. As some of the other reviewers noted, Pomella costs more than what some …

I ordered my old go to order - the arugula, cabbage, bean sprout, figs and goat cheese and decided to add the falafel in. My friend got the Majadra Plate with the lamb sirloin, which I had never had but sounded very tasty. Everything is nice. I highly recommended this restaurant.
Loved it
Really outstanding middle eastern food.   Lots of nuance to the flavors,  something that is an actual chef instead of a cook.   And a local business as well.

I so missed their former eatery,babite(so?).  I stopped here this afternoon to get on dish to go. Color me disappointed.  The pomegranate eggplant with saffron rice was tasty but it was 90 percent rice.   What happened to the eggplant?  Plus, $16.00 and change for rice......  I won't be racing back for anything else
The Best!!! Fresh, organic, and lively flavors. I go there often! It’s very delicious and has something for every member of the family.

This place is amazing. I used to love Ba-Bite when I lived up the street from Piedmont and was so sad when I heard they closed. Their foods were always fresh, flavorful and delightful and seemed to be made with lots of TLC. I was thrilled …
Every single dish we've tried here is thoughtful and delicious. They time and package takeout beautifully.  I would say our favorites but it's everything. 🤷‍♀️
High quality food made with fresh ingredients, well composed and plates. Holds up well in takeout

I ordered the feta stuffed falafels, butternut squash quinoa arugula salad with chicken, and the almond paste baklava for dinner tonight.  Absolutely delicious and just how I remembered! The cost of my meal was around $28 but the meal was plentiful and I have enough leftovers for lunch tomorrow.
Fantastic services and delicious food... Nice staff great place!!!
Second time trying, overall the hummus is good but the service has been terrible both times. Be prepared to wait (outdoors) unless ordering in advance.

The crew is exceptionally loving and experienced. The service is awfully rapid. Needless to say, the food they serve is good. I visited many times and I was always satisfied. The rate is honest. I recommend this restaurant to all my friends.
The butternut salad is delicious, fresh, and packed with an amazing balance of flavor and texture. Also highly recommend the chicken wrap, hummus/pita, and everything else on the menu.

All the positive reviews I've read about these restaurants are real. The friendliness and service of the staff appears real. I've never had the sort of good customer service I've had with them. Thank you very much for that.
10/10. This place is amazing!!! Looking forward to trying everything on the menu :)
Amazing fresh pita and hummus

Amazing, best middle eastern in oakland. I loved babite and this is even better. Everything was top notch but the dessert, I’m not even sure what it was some kind of toffee custard with fresh whipped cream on top is unbelievable. Will …
Dynamite grub

So, so delicious. This has been my favorite treat restaurant during covid. We do easy curbside pickup of our order, and everything we've had (veggie and meat) is really delicious. You have the option to pick up hot or heat up at home, and …
Service was first class.
Spectacular food.  Wow.  Definitely get muj adara.

The food was just as good, if not better, than I remembered. My salad was so flavorful with a nice acidic touch from the cabbage and vinaigrette, the feta was creamy and wonderful, and the figs added the perfect contract to all of the other …

The only problem with this place is that I can’t get everything I want when I go because there are soooooo many things I want!  It is Thursday and my friend from the Middle East took me there on Sunday.   I then went again on my own on …

Pomella is quickly becoming a new favorite of mine. Admittedly I order takeout entirely too often - especially during the pandemic when food has become my primary source of comfort and joy. I love the food at Pomella, the sauces are all so …

I sent my friends to this restaurant with my highest recommendations. I visit this place often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The the food there is delicious and the crew is attentive and cooperative. always when we visit this place we enjoy a lovely evening.  I warmly recommend this restaurant.

Wow! This place is just fantastic!!! I was there over the weekend for pick-up. Let me begin by saying I did have some trouble with ordering on their website so I called and spoke to Jessica. I am a vegetarian and she went over all the dishes that I could eat. There are SO many options for vegetarians and vegans there!

Just finished our takeout Absolutely Delicious!! Everything superb  The pizza crust is amazing perfect Pasta seafood fresh Meatballs reminds me of my grandmother's  Definitely we will be back !Next course dessert I am sure it will unbelievable Thank you for a delicious dinner

I’m grateful to Pomella for consistently providing me with delicious food and drink during this pandemic. Take-out is packaged with such care and often is accompanied by instructions for best preparing at home to resemble the in-dining …
really great food, fun vibe, lovely staff. this has become a go-to for us. especially recommend the sangria!
So delicious!!!! Order and pickup was seamless and easy. Staff was very friendly and walked order out to car. Ordered so much and everything was so good!
Great food and very convenient pickup right in the parking lot!

Pomella is a hidden gem tucked away in the corner of Piedmont & Yosemite. So if you order on door dash just continue down Piedmont until you reach Yosemite.  This place is a great healthy option if you are looking for a guilt free meal. We …
Amazing Amazing!
Had great Thanksgiving and Hannuka Dinners and looking forward to Christmas.  I wonder if they do Kwanza?  Great food and reasonably priced.
The food was wonderful! Ordered a bunch of different items for different and loved all of them. Delicious flavors and great serving amounts of what we paid for. A wonderful meal!
Great Middle Eastern food with an Israeli twist.  We've ordered several take out meals from them during lock down and have been very happy!

All I can say my Family fall in love with food from Pomella! Middle eastern, delicious, healthy food! Great job ! We did have order for Thanksgiving meal, and simply everything we had ,was absolutely delicious! You will not regret choosing Pomella!
My favorite Middle Eastern restaurant in the East Bay. Yes, you can get it delivered or do curbside pickup.

We had a fabulous Thanksgiving dinner from Pomella, picked up one day in advance. The turkey was excellent and unlike any I've had before: slices of white turkey breast each stuffed with ground dark meat flavored with apple and cranberry. …
Wonderful service and amazing food! A definitely must-try if you haven't already.
Pomella offers delicious food and reasonable prices. One of my new favorite restaurants in Oakland! A modern take on Middle Eastern food. Contactless pickup too!
Absolutely delicious Middle Eastern food. Every dish we got was made perfectly, and it’s nice to see some creative variations on the menu.

Our fav lunch spot in the east bay! Sometimes we go multiples times a week! Been a big fan since ba-bite and Pomella is still as good! My favorites are salads + protein combo. So fresh and so filling!! They have a nice outdoor seating or great to take home.

Pomella has delicious, imaginative food and excellent customer communications and service! They go the extra mile to make sure their customers are satisfied. I ordered Thanksgiving dinner for four people from Pomella and we enjoyed a feast! …
Delicious, some of the best Mediterranean food I've had in the East Bay. nice folks :)
Friendly staff, fresh food, good vegetarian options and reasonably priced. Let's help keep our neighborhood restaurants open in these crazy times.
The food was excellent. I will definitely be revisiting this restaurant.

Hands down, this is my favorite restaurant in Oakland! I used to go every week to Ba-Bite and was so sad to see her close until she opened up again with Pomella! Her food is soooo delicious. Whenever I want something healthy that is still …
Great communication on my Thanksgiving pre order! And the food was amazing, thanks Pomella
One of our favorite/go to restaurants in Oakland! They do easy and quick curbside pick-up, everything tastes like a warm hug, and I highly recommend getting their sangria to go. Yay Pomella!

The food at Pomella is absolutely delicious. I loved Ba-Bite, their former restaurant and Pomella is even better.  The falafel is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The hummus is really good and their desserts are insanely good.

We were so excited to see that the brilliant folks from Ba-Bite were back with Pomella! The food is absolutely delicious and healthy - perfect for ordering in for a break from cooling at home. Thank you so much for staying open during this pandemic.
Great little place on Piedmont Ave.  I love Israeli food and Pomella does a great job.  Loved the hummus and other traditional sides/mains.  Prices are very reasonable too.  Enjoy!

Our group was a hard one to satisfy with vegans, vegetarians, and meat-preference eaters to satisfy. The feedback from everybody was extremely positive. The Majadra (eggplant as rice-based protein) , Lafa Wraps (2 falafel, 1 lamb), and …

We used to frequent Ba-Bite, so when Pomella (the new iteration) opened we were excited. The menu is slightly expanded and so far everything has been great - I love the salads, the hummus, and seasonal offerings. We plan to try the Hanukkah …

Wonderful middle eastern food! Everything we had was excellent with balanced, deep flavors. It was a huge disappointment when their previous spot Ba-Bite lost its lease, and I was thrilled to see them reopen.

Completely delicious-- I'm so glad they are open! Our meal from Pomella was the best take out I've had in all of COVID. Loved every item we ordered, and we ordered a lot because we wanted everything.  They're in a space towards the back of …

very glad to have Ba-Bite version 2.0! very soulful and flavorful cooking overall and the seasonal dishes are fun to try. hummus is excellent and tastes like what i've had in israel. desserts are a surprise hit too!

Got take out from here- first time though had heard great things about their previous restaurant Ba-Bite and wanted to check them out. Got the falafel and was not disappointed! Will definitely come back :)

When we heard Ba-Bite was gone, we were so disappointed. Luckily, it has been reborn as Pomella, and it has the same amazing food as Ba-Bite. Everything is as delicious as ever, and the take-out/pickup option is super fast and easy. Love this place!

Yum, Yum, Yum!!!   Best in the East Bay, for sure!!!   We love to order a ton of the mezze to share... can't go wrong!!   I love being able to order online for pick-up, makes it easy to do during COVID.     You will not regret choosing Pomella!

We’ve eaten here twice - both times it’s been scrumptious!  The seasoning is perfection. We especially love the Lamb Mezze and the humus.  (And since I have a sweet tooth, the baklava and rugelach, of course!)

Best food on PIedmont Ave. Best Middle Eastern food in Oakland. I was so sad when Ba-Bite closed down and, though it took a while, Pomella is just as good and better. So glad they are serving up their delicious food. Top top notch for vegan/vegetarians.

This place is absolutely one of my favorite spots in the East Bay. Everything is so beautifully put together, well seasoned, well cooked, interesting and flavorful. The majadra is one a menu highlight and I love it with the eggplant. The …

A bit expensive but it is all worth it. They have also a small function room for private gatherings which I appreciated so much. All of their dishes are very tasteful and affordable. If you're on a strict budget, this place is the best for you. The best ever! Highly recommended!
Great food.  Great service.   Easy order and pickup
Oh, man. The feta-stuffed falafel. 'Nuff said.

Terrific! This restaurant is indeed one of the best when it comes to its food and services. I'm so grateful that I had the chance to try this place together with my friends and it was nice because the foods here are all worth it. I could not ask for more about these guys because I was greatly satisfied. Thanks, everyone!

Great, fresh, Cali-Mediterranean food! Even during busy times this place handles the lines very well and have a nice outdoor patio for eating. Delicious garlicky humus, or as I know it from growing up, humus.

I could say that the chef is a pro for he could prepare food excellently. I loved taking photos inside the restaurant because of its beautiful interior, but what I liked the most about this place is a wonderful service and fantastic food. Highly recommended!

A friend from Farley's recommended it and I had not doubt that Pomella's food was delicious. In fact it was! We picked up our order and enjoyed it at the park. Everything was very tasty and the portions satisfying. I strongly recommend it and I wish I was still in Oakland to have other delicious meals from Pomella with my dear friends!

The food, ambiance, staff, and experience as a whole were amazing and a once in a lifetime visit! There were so many options for food, it was displayed with eloquence, there was soft live entertainment, a magician who came around to the …
Good restaurant
Well, the box didnt have much food in it.
Love Pomella! I was so sad when their previous incarnation as Ba-Bite closed. The hummus is divine and the desserts are so mouth watering. Very glad to have Pomella back on Piedmont!

I ordered the saffron rice with chicken. It was decent, but definitely needed some of the additional sauces. The additional sauces all cost extra, so that was a bit surprising since the dish was rather bland without it. When asking for …
Their food tastes fresh and flavorful, especially the Kefta. You can see the herbs once you bite into one. And the baklava is a must order!
GREAT food - easy ordering - COVID safe pick-up. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a new and delicious dinner option in the neighborhood.
Mica’s food is amazing! I’ve been privileged to have tried many of her dishes- from savory to sweet and I can’t say enough. Oh, and her hummus is the best you’ll ever taste. Highly recommended!
Great food, great service, super safe contactless pickup :)
Amazing hummus!  Definitely hit that craving for me.  Parking lot made for super easy order pickup and the whole process was smooth.  Will be adding Pomella to the rotation!
The service was great. We called in advance and showed up 13 minutes later to grab our ready to eat takeout! The Majadra plate is absolutely delicious. I highly recommend this restaurant!

Really, really liked the food. I’ve been several times and have gotten a couple different salads with chicken, lamb and salmon. The chick and lamb were really tasty. Tender, moist. Salmon was cooked well but it’s farm raised so I wouldn’t …

Really tasty, original food at an affordable price. Also, Pomella shares outdoor seating space with Dona, so you can safely dine outside while enjoying their original fare. A must-visit if you're in the neighborhood (or even if you're not—I ventured here from Berkeley).

The food here is excellent! Healthy, affordable and tasty. It's so great they are here as Ba Bite used to be a go-to for us and we were sad when it closed. Safe, outdoor pick-up and dining during COVID. It's perfect!
I love how Pomella takes traditional, authentic Israeli food and incorporates modern California inspired twists. The food is wonderful and the service is welcoming.
Consistently delicious, fresh nurturing Middle Eastern food. Our favorite in Oakland. So glad they reopened from Ba- Bite!

The food at Pomella is consistently delicious. It’s our go-to for take-out, both everyday and for special occasions. Their website is simple to navigate with great pictures and descriptions of each dish, and the pick-up arrangement is a cinch, so easy! Highly recommended!

I recently ordered from Pomella for my fiance's birthday and it did not disappoint! Everything was so delicious! We loved everything- each dish was better than the next- and we will definitely be ordering from here frequently from now on.

This place is hands down the best Mediterranean food in the Bay Area. We’ve ordered from it many times, and everything has been top notch, from the hummus and the couscous to the cakes. Highly recommended!
Best Mediterranean food in Oakland!

We love Pomella so much and feel lucky to have them here.  The food is delicious.  Best hummus ever, love ALL  the salads, and the Majadra plate is a personal favorite.  And don't get me started on their desserts.  Most of all I think I …
Simply delicious food, even out of to-go containers. So so happy that the folks from Babite came back, maybe even better than ever.
Love this place. The food is exceptional and consistent, and the people are great. It is a touch on the spendy side, but the portions are hearty and we always have leftovers.

Excellent food, period.  If you liked Ba-bite (the owner's old restaurant), or even if you've never heard of it but you're looking for some fresh, tasty, different takeout to get you out of the pizza/burrito Covid takeout rut, look no …

SO DELICIOUS! The fesenjan chicken with saffron rice is one of my favorite dishes of all time, sweet and savory and amazing. Shirazi salad with feta is perfect for a warmer day, so refreshing. One of my favorite mediterranean places of all time!

Pomella has unrealistically delicious Israeli and Mediterranean food. Hummus without cumin, fresh flavorful produce, and insane desserts. Get the revolving lemonade, eggplant, and fragrant baklava! You won't be sorry.
We ordered Hummus, Pita, Falafel, and Lamb Kefta.  They were all delicious and the Hummus is out of this world!

I was sad when Ba Bite closed so I was so happy to try out Pomella, the new place by the former Ba Bite owner. I went with my son, it was the first place I've eaten at since the Pandemic. Happy to report everything lived up to my …
Pomella's food is always fresh and delicious! It's a staple around our house. The hummus and rice plates are wonderful, and don't miss the lightly spiced iced coffee!
Great, healthy food! They use high-quality ingredients, and everything was perfectly spiced.

Pomella is a joyful place with food that makes me happy!! Mica is a talented chef and you can tell that she cares about creative food, the environment, and the community. She makes beautiful, tasty, healthy, food that my whole family loves. …

It would be an understatement to say we were devastated when Ba-Bite, one of our favorite places in Oakland, closed. Then when we heard the owner was going to open Pomella, practically right across the street, we were ecstatic! (We even …
Pomella is DELICIOUS! Fresh, flavorful, and the highest quality ingredients! We've found that a lot of restaurant food has gown downhill since Covid. Not Pomella. As good as ever!!!
The dishes  are amazing  fresh, tasty, and very delicious.  Lots outside  sitting  and parking

We've been enjoying Mica's amazing food for years, and at Pomella she continues to deliver super delicious healthy dishes, sides, desserts, and more. Curbside pickup during shelter-in-place has made it so quick and easy to bring home …
I loved Ba-Bite and am so grateful they are reinvented and reopened! The beet salad and sauces are all amazing. Fresh, vibrant flavors that are totally crave-worthy. Yum.
Delicious! Falafel is awesome.  Portions are a little bit small compare to the price.
Tasty menu, friendly staff, love their outdoor patio for socially-distanced dining! So glad to have them in the neighborhood!
Pomella's food is always great! Be sure to try their spicy schug as a meal accompaniment, and finish off with one of their desserts.
Wonderful and flavorful food.  Homemade taste with no fuss, a go-to for my family.
The food was delicious and so fresh. We have tried a few dishes and loved them all.
I really enjoyed our dinner from Pomella! The ingredients are fresh and high quality and the flavors are rich. It's slightly pricey, but worth it. I'd order from them again!

Did you think you were going to have a break down when Ba Bite closed?  I sure did.  But you can cheer up, because Ba Bite has been re-created into Pomella.  Amazing Middle Eastern food.  Cheese stuff falafel is to die for.  Love the …

My wife and I are so grateful that Pomella is back in the neighborhood! Ba Bite was one of our go to spots and Pomella has brought back a lot of the same dishes. The butternut squash and quinoa salad and the majadera plate with lamb are two …

We finally tried Pomella tonight and it did not disappoint! Everything was so fresh and delicious. The hummus plate with falafel was amazing, as was the lamb kefta and saffron cauliflower salad. We also loved the pickles - what a nice …

Pomella is unlike any other restaurant. I loved Ba-Bite and Pomella is every bit as good. The flavor profiles, the care and quality make it a step above other restaurants. It is healthy, fresh and satisfying.  Quality is not lost in travel. Also, I love the pantry items! Do yourself a favor and order soon!
Pomella always has tremendous quality of ingredients, fresh and healthy and delicious food. Everything is good there!
Staple healthy delicious real good food
Love this place! Amazing hummus and pita. I like everything I’ve ever ordered here.
So delicious! One of my favorite spots in the neighborhood.
The food was delicious and Pomella is on our regular rotation now!

I loved Babite was so sad when it closed. I'm so glad there isn ow Pomella, and it is equally delicious. I love to get the rice with any of the proteins, and always get the mujadara. Such good food, lots of veggies and marinated meats...it is fresh and flavorful. Can't recommend enough!

Loved Ba-Bite? --> You'll love Pomella!  Everything I've ordered there is always beautiful, delicious, and filling!  I'm a big fan of their chicken fesenjan, majadra plate, butternut squash salad, and rugelach!
Wonderful food and a really excellent location
Can’t go wrong with a wrap or a bowl. The lamb is my favorite. Decent beer selection too, and the staff is so warm and friendly. A true hidden gem in Oakland. If you know, you know.
Tasty food, nice out door dining area, very friendly and polite staff! It's hard to pull off a pleasant dining experience mid pandemic but Pomella did it!
Excellent Middle Eastern food at affordable prices. Excellent pick-up and takeout service, along with outside dining. Highly recommend.
Food was delicious, as always.  Happy to see this new iteration of Ba Bite!

I've loved Mica's food since taking my first bite at Ba-bite, her previous restaurant. She nails all the subtlety and wonderful range of Israeli cuisine and the opening of Pomella would have been a great reason to celebrate had it not happened at the dawn of the Covid-era

Have always enjoyed the wonderful flavors and fresh ingredients created by Mica and so glad she stayed in the Piedmont neighborhood with her new restaurant Pomella. I hope she survives the COVID 19 Restaurant shut down restraints. I have been using their fantastic drive up, meal pick up service during this time to keep me well fed.
Really delicious. Aromatic and flavorful, great place to get food. I waited 30 minutes after they said the food was ready though which wasn't so great. I'd still highly recommend.

Pomella has been a go-to for us since they opened. The food is delicious, hearty and satisfying. You can taste the love in all the dishes. We also get the generous produce box and the special sweet treats that Mica conjures up. Everything is yummy and they couldn't be nicer. Lucky we're neighbors!

So delicious! It's impossible to go wrong with Pomella's menu but whatever you do, add the shug sauce to it. ZING! It's so fresh and the perfect amount of spice. My mouth is watering just thinking about it. Also, pro tip; order the pita …
The food here is fresh and delicious!

What an asset to have this wonderful local option for takeout during the pandemic (not to mention the creative menu and local ingredients!) I am so happy to have Pomella in rotation for healthy, high-quality, reasonably priced meals...and …
Awesome food. Healthy and so flavorful! I highly recommend it.
Best hummus in the bay
Really enjoyed the food (picked up, of course). Nice addition to the neighborhood - and love to see that cool building finally being used
Bland and expensive.

Delicious! Best Mediterranean food I've had in the East Bay. Like you're eating healthy, home-cooked food, but elevated. They're so sweet there—very accommodating when I put in a special request. A great new addition to the East Bay. I've …

We got a halvah babka from Pomella not long ago that was out-of-control delicious, with convenient car-side pickup and everything. Halvah is a treat I don't often indulge in, and the babka incorporated it in a way that wasn't overly sweet or decadent.

Absolutely LOVE Pomella! The food is always fresh, and amazing. The menu has seasonal additions constantly that are always delightful. The staff is friendly and helpful. Very happy to support a woman-owned business that is always incredibly high quality. Recommend highly!

This is a great spot.  The salads are amazing, really unique and delicious- especially the Shirazi.  The Falafel is excellent and the hummus is homemade and yummy.  Great place for vegetarians but the Tagine or Majadra with your choice of meat is really hearty and flavorful .  You really can not go wrong here!
The food is delicious and you can tell it’s made with love. If it were a couple dollars less per dish I would eat here more often, but it is fair compensation for the quality, for sure. Recommend.
Incredibly fresh and delicious food! I love the Lamb Kefta, their spicy green sauce, all the salads and the hummus is delicious!!

OMG Pomella! We love this place! Every dish we've ordered from Pomella has been excellent. We were so bummed when Ba Bite closed and thrilled to hear that we could get Mica's food again. The easy outdoor walkup has been so amazing during …
Very good! Hummus is next level and the carry a number of solid vegan options which suits me just fine! Way to go. Welcome to the neighborhood!
Food is fantastic!! I recommend it all!!
Love the cheese stuffed falafels!! Pita and hummus were delicious. Looking forward to going back and trying out other items on the menu

I adore this restaurant! I have loved Mica’s cooking since she had BaBite just down the street. Do yourself a favor and order anything on the menu., you will not be disappointed. I got the chicken tagine and it was warm, comforting, …
Great spot... delicious, healthy foods served with great service!

I never miss a stop at Pomella whenever I go anywhere near Oakland.  I live in Sausalito but any trip to the east bay MUST include getting my Israeli food fix.  I am especially addicted to the layered flavors of Mica's Majadra Plate, so …
Very delicious take out. Smaller portions for the price. They forgot the pickles with the hummus plate I ordered. EDIT: customer support is great, they followed up promptly.

If you were fans of Ba-Bite and were deeply saddened when they closed, you now have reason to feel joy: Ba-Bite is back as Pomella! We were regulars at Ba-Bite, and it really was our go-to place for lunch, especially on weekends. I'm so …
Hummus plate is to die for.  It's the best hummus you will have in the bay area.  All the dishes are delightful and don't miss the best baklava - so moist and delicious.

It was my daughter in laws birthday. We wanted to celebrate. She requested food from Pomella. It was delivered to their house and we did celebrate with delicious food. My three year old grandson liked it a lot, so did his one year old sister. Thanks for making our celebration memorable.
Fantastic food! Best salads in the world, lamb is fantastic, and I love their desserts. Everyone who works there is so nice too, a must eat!

I used to eat a Ba-Bite regularly and was so happy when Pomella opened! I love to cook, so when I order food to go I really want it to be delicious or why bother. Pomella is great restaurant for a dependably delicious, healthy, and …

Love this restaurant and their dedicated team! Every week, the business owner writes a very heartwarming email with the specials (hint: if the salted caramel chocolate cake comes back, do yourself a favor and order it) and the food always hits the spot. Plus, they coffee contact-less curbside pick up. How thoughtful is that?!

This is a fantastic female-owned small business with delicious food, sourced with high quality ingredients. Try the hummus or lamb kefta.   The feta-stuffed falafel is also a special treat.   I love picking up one of their wraps and heading up to the hills for a hike/picnic.
So glad Pomella is thriving during the pandemic. I missed their food so much when Ba Bite went away and I'm so happy to have this tasty, healthy restaurant back in the same neighborhood!

I love Pomella and everything they do! It's always clear how much care goes into the dishes here, from ingredient sourcing to cooking and assembly. The owner Mica has always been so enthusiastic to share information on how things are made …

I was a huge Ba Bite fan and was so bummed when they closed!! In comes Pomella which brings back all my favorites from Ba Bite, but I think even better! I think they have the best hummus in the entire world. All of their food is so fresh, tasty and the menu changes often. Highly recommend!

Great food, highly recommend! I previously loved going to their first restaurant Ba-bite and was excited when Pomella opened back up. I love their lamb rice plate, hummus and falafel, and fresh, organic veggies. They also have delicious desserts!
I 💗 Pomella!! The food is delicious 😋 and healthy to boot. Sometimes we order from here more than once per week 😉

SO thrilled about Pomella! Ba-bite was our absolute favorite and this is even more incredible. That arugula butternut squash salad . . . I dream about it. Our entire family has about 4 favorites each; we always over-order but the food is …
Fresh, healthy, deliciously prepared food. Five stars!
We loved Ba Bite and were so happy to see it re-open as Pomella just down the street. The food is comforting, fresh, and healthy. Pomella does not disappoint!

ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS! I originally learned of Pomella through Instagram and started following along as they opened shop. I have since ordered from them twice, and have loved EVERYTHING. The Lamb kefta Majadra plate is my favorite - and the spiced coffee is delicious. Definitely recommend and hope to see this place booming soon.

The food was good and the location was amazing. The outdoor seating area is so cute and parking is easy which is a huge bonus for the area. Food was very yummy and bright and I felt full but not weighed down after eating. 100% recommend.

I'm now a regular here, and everything I've tried has been fantastic.  The food is super fresh and delicious, and the portions are generous.  I especially love the unique and tasty desserts.  This place is one-of-a-kind, you must try it!!

So so happy Pomella opened when it did! My boyfriend and I have eaten there a bunch of times now and have told all of our friends and family about it. The first time we ate there they were so sweet and threw in some baklava! We were feeling …
So glad to have Ba-Bite/Pomella back in the neighborhood! It's everything I've been missing, plus delicious new desserts. We'll be getting their salads, hummus, and eggplant mezze every week!
We love Pomella! The food is delicious, fresh and plentiful and the pita is sublime. Order extra!

Food was pretty good—nice lemony hummus, and the chicken tangine was tasty. But these prices are absolutely obscene. $17 entree comes in a small box and will not fill you up. $5 for white sauce in a tiny to-go cup (a size I’d expect to get …
Delicious food, especially the stuffed falafel and the lamb. Glad to see this place back in business. The outdoor seating is great for having a dining-out experience in the middle of a pandemic.

Great food with lots of unique flavor! I recommend both organic sauces.  Customer service is great too. Hard working staff.  However, don't get the rose in a can (named "She Can"). Got the worst headache ever from drinking one can of that.
This place has delicious food, best Mediterranean I’ve had. Fresh and rich, great flavor profiles.  I recommend anything and everything, it’s all yummy!

Every time that we eaten at Pomella or her previous restaurant we have had an amazing experience! From the Blackberry, rose petal Sangria to her roasted cauliflower salad and then the desserts......you will be wowed! The best part it is all organic and healthy!
Excellent side dishes and salads, and the best hummus I've had this side of the Mediterranean Sea.

I used to go to Ba Bite on Piedmont Ave before they closed and loved the food there so I was excited to hear that the chef opened up Pomella just down the street in the same building as Doña. The food is still amazing and I recommend everyone going there and supporting a talented woman chef!!

Pomella’s desserts have been a welcome bright spot throughout the SIP months, during which I’ve been ordering regularly (maybe too regularly 😂) and sharing (sometimes🤣), or just taunting my friends online with photos of the deliciousness before it is devoured. Their hummus is my favorite as well.
Great hummus, za'atar chips, roasted eggplant, mujaddra and more. Some dishes were less successful, but overall fresh, tasty, high quality food.

It is hard enough to be cooking so much more since the kids are not eating school lunches or eating out as much but trying to get them to eat healthy can be a challenge.. So I was happy to find Pomella to provide healthy yummy salads that …
Had a really delicious take-out experience. Pick-up was easy, and the food still tasted really fresh and flavorful, even though it was take-out!
The falafel is perfect! But truly everything here is fresh and delicious
They truly have the best salads in Oakland. Such a great selection of tasty, healthy food. They're a go-to when I want to treat myself well.

During shelter in place and quarantine, this is the place my boyfriend and I consistently order from. The food is always fresh and delicious. And Mica reveals a new exciting dessert each week that is always guaranteed to be an amazing dish. …
Love Pomella's food. It's craveworthy-delicious and good for you at the same time. So glad they've opened on Piedmont ave!
The food here is amazing. Order one of everything (and two orders of the hummus!) - you won't regret it! The world needs more food like this.

Loved all of the food we picked up, especially the salmon and stuffed falafel. It was so easy to order online and pick up was a breeze, they had it waiting and brought it to my car. They have both frozen and cold food which is great, looking forward to trying more items out. Hoping to get a strawberry rhubarb pie one time!
Got the saffron rice with lamb. Picked it up on time. Drove 6 mins home. Food was cold, and flavor was very average. Disappointed because the reviews were so good.

Pomella is awesome, I’ve loved everything I’ve tried. There are so many vegetarian options on the menu, and all are creative (not an afterthought like the vegetarian options at so many other restaurants) My current favorite is the falafel …
Everything was fresh and delicious... I wish I lived in the East Bay so I could order from them more often! Excellent falafel and hummus and great salads! So good!

The food at Pomella is fantastic -- delicious, fresh, with some dishes changing every week depending on what's in season. I loved this place when it was Ba-bite, and am so glad Mica opened a new space next to Dona.
We love Pomella!  The food is absolutely delicious - I could live on the hummus alone.  Everyone in my family will eat this, even the picky 5 year old!  Its healthy, nutritious and so yummy.
Incredible food! Best hummus in the Bay Area.
I was so excited to see Bi Bite reopened now as Pomella! Food is fast, it is easy to take things to go, and is a healthy and delicious lunch and dinner option. Go check them out!
Everything tastes like a professional chef created just for you a homemade meal. This some of the best hummus I've ever had, and the stuffed falafel have a kick.

I was really excited to try Pomella as I LOVE hummus and the reviews were amazing. Mabe it was just an off day, but I was unpleasantly surprised by my hummus plate with chicken. It was $20 for a very small portion, the pita and chicken were …

I was so delighted and relieved to find that BaBites was reopening under a new name, Pomella. They have been so creative with the current circumstances, and also are consistent with there delicious staples!

The food and hospitality at Pomella are great. The hummus and pita chips and rugelach were all above and beyond expectations. I am craving more and will be back again and again, especially in these trying times when a treat makes life that much more enjoyable.

I love this place! Outside dining is nice. Food is fresh and healthy. Staff is awesome. They bring in delicious organic Ingredients. Mostly compostable packaging.  My favorite dishes are the quiona squash salad, stuffed falafels, falafel …

Pomela has delicious food made with high quality ingredients, is locally owned, and comes with the added bonus that they’ve made it super easy to pick up food to go.  I love the majadera, the hummus, and pretty much everything else we have tried! Look forward to dining in someday.

Gotta say I finally had a chance to try Pomella from their new digs on Piedmont ave. Ordered for pickup, and everything was perfect! I really enjoyed the Lafa flatbread wrap with chicken, just what I wanted! Plus the falafel, which I …
Yummy foods.   Fresh.   I bit pricey but very good quality.
Pomella's food is delicious!! I have been looking for a good middle-eastern restaurant in the area for awhile, and this hits the spot. The roasted eggplant is to die for!
It's great to see all my old favorites from Ba-Bite available again. The tagines are great. Also, the red cabbage and beet salads. The rugelah is also great, but not as good as my greandmothers.

Pomella is simply wonderful! When Ba-Bite closed I was heartbroken- it was a go to place for take out and eat in for me- the perfect price point for a pick me up kind of dinner that was healthy, delicious and full to the brim with flavor. I …

I have missed Ba-Bite so much in its dormancy, and now that it’s back and better than ever as Pomella I could not be happier. We love everything. The hummus plate with falafel is a real hit. Our one year old baby loves the salmon. Make sure …

If you live in the East Bay and like Middle Eastern food, you NEED to eat here. Halal Guys has nothing on Pomella. The food at Pomella is absolutely comparable to what I’ve eaten in Turkey and Israel. My favorites are the majadra, the …

When Ba Bite left us we waited patiently for Pomella to open and now it's here. With its new outdoor space Pomella is even better than Ba Bite. Chicken hummus plate with homemade lemonade--the perfect picnic--has gotten us through some …

Pomella serves great, fresh, organic meals. We are so glad to have them back in the neighborhood. They have the best hummus, pita and salads. Great desserts too. Everything is great, you can't go wrong.

OH MY!!! What a lifesaver Pomella has been for me. First, I love food!! 2nd I love good, clean , healthy food, and I find plenty of both at Pomella. Since the pandemic has ceased gatherings I find that I can ask 3 or 4 friends to meet me at …

The food here is incredible!!! Best Hummus I have had in the Bay Area by far and with fresh baked pita what more could you ask for.  Make sure you buy some of the sweets... I cant get enough! Check this place out, you will not be disappointed.

Pomella is delicious! The falafel are on point- crispy but also moist. The meats are perfectly seasoned and generously portioned. I’m a huge rice/bean/ veg lover too on my vegetarian days and their majadera is perfect. Highly recommend the …
I loved this place when it was Ba Bite, and I love it now. Incredibly fresh, healthy and tasty! As a vegetarian, I'm grateful for all the veggie options!

We had been searching for a good Middle Eastern restaurant here in Oakland, and we found Pomella.  We loved everything we ordered. It wasn't greasy at all and we will come to this place as often as we can.  It is right next to the new Dona Tomas! So cool.
Delicious food, friendly staff, quick service, great outdoor space, compostable to-go packaging.

Pomella is a delicious local spot. I loved this place when it was Ba-Bite and was thrilled when they reopened down the street. The food is delicious and very unique. They have outdoor, covid safe tables. I have eaten both at the location and taken food to go. Definitely check them out!

We got dinner here and are at a nearby park.the food was very thoughtfully prepared and tasty. It's a bit difficult to find the order window from the main street, as it seems to be in the same building as another restaurant. I would definitely recommend to friends!
Pomelo is amazing! Great food, love the location. Was super easy to order and pick up, and felt safe with how they navigate this with COVID precautions.

I visited Pomella with a friend and we both loved what we ordered. And we had the white sangria with fresh fruit. My lamb and saffron rice with yogurt sauce was so good I barely breathed while eating. My friend had a hearty salad with …

Delicious food! Lots of flavor in seemingly simple dishes. The salmon is cooked to perfection and was good fresh fish (hard to find). I actually went back again a couple days later bc I couldn’t stop thinking about it!

Fresh, tasty, hearty, healthy, all in one. I can't tell you how ECSTATIC I was to hear that Pomella reopened (formerly Ba Bite) because it was one of my reliably delicious go-to spots at work. Like, I was giddy. The food is still just as …
Excellent food, really nice people. Try it out!

We were so sad when BaBite (Pomella’s previous incarnation) closed that we might have shed some tears. But Pomella Is everything we missed and more. Such excellent wraps and salads, and the desserts are out of this world! Thank you for being a part of the community. We are thrilled to be able to support such a good business!
Love this place!
Good food. Great accommodations during Shelter in place

I was a big fan of Ba-Bite and was looking forward to trying Pomella.  It's one of the first places I ordered from during the pandemic, and I was not disappointed.  Super easy to order online.  Very easy and friendly drive up pick up. …
Delicious as ever !!
Ordered from here for pick up a few weeks ago and was amazed by the food! The quality was incredible, the hummus was so light and fluffy!! Tons of hummus leftover.

This isn’t the first time I have ordered from Pomella  and It certainly won’t be my last. I’m so happy that Mica is back on Piedmont Ave! I used to go to Ba-Bite regularly and was so sad when it closed. Pomella has all of the previous …

I was so happy when Pomella opened. (I was a big fan of Ba Bite), and it's become a favorite. I like ordering a range of the mezze dishes with an entree and bakalava, so there is always plenty for leftovers and I get to enjoy the goodness …

I love Middle Eastern food, and Pomella never disappoints. Mica's salads are crisp, creative, and packed with protein. I've been ordering from Pomella directly and picking up take out throughout the pandemic and everything is always superb. …
So glad to have them back! I've known and worked with the owner for years. She epitomizes hard work and passion for the cuisine. Good fortune!

Pomella is such a delight! Pre-order and pick up or order at the window and sit outside on the patio. Their falafel wrap is one of my favorite lunches in Oakland. Definitely get yourself an order of hummus - it's the smoothest hummus you'll ever have! Also on the menu are hearty salads and plates as well as desserts. So, so good!

The food at Pomella is delicious, innovative, and packed with flavor and style that is just right. I can't say enough about the blend of fresh ingredients, generous portions, and good pricing. The staff and owner Mica work so hard to create …

To those wondering if you should drive over and give Pomella a try, I would whole heartedly say yes. For those who don’t know, the owner of the former Ba-bite (which was located just a little further up Piedmont Avenue) recently opened this …
We had the kefta over saffron rice and butternut squash with quinoa. Delish!! Would highly recommend going.
Totally yummy food! We loved everything we ordered and will be back for sure.
Delicious food and great for pick-up / take-away
Great food! We really liked the curbside pickup, and the lunch/dessert options were all awesome. We particularly liked the plum cake!
Pomella is wonderful! Love their hummus and falafel. Also the majadra plate with lamb is awesome! Definitely one of my new favorites in the neighborhood.

We are elated to have Mica back! The food here is wonderfully comforting.  We enjoy every dish, but especially both the majadara and fesenjan.  My tip: try it all and don’t be shy!  There’s enough to choose from to curate a three course …

I was devastated to learn that one of my favorite restaurants, Ba-Bite closed last year. It was a frequent visit for my family of mixed vegetarian and meat-eaters. When I out find out they were back with Pomella, I jumped at the opportunity …
Love their food. Always fresh and delicious. A gem!
I was missing the food from Ba-Bite after they closed -- so glad the same great food is back at Pomella. The parking lot makes pick up very easy.

If anyone doesn't know about Pomella, it is time to eat their NOW, it is so delicious, you never had better Middle Eastern Food. From Micah's Wraps to Falafel ,Tagines, Salads & oh, let me not forget all the super tasty desserts, from …
Pomella's food is consistently excellent and of the highest, freshest quality. The kindest people, a delightful experience. Don't wait!

This is a totally awesome place!  Even though we don't live nearby, we swing by about once a week to pick up a meal, buy some hummus and pita (REALLY GOOD) to take home or order ahead to get some produce (last week, yummy tomatoes and …

Everything is extra special here: salads, hot plates, desserts. There are some permanent menu items - crispy falafel, creamy hummus, perfect house made pita or lafa (flatbread).  Each week, there are novel menu items as well - typically …

As a woman of Middle Eastern descent, I am very picky about the mediterranean food that I eat. My late grandmother would have it no other way, may she rest in culinary peace. My grandmother's ghost and I both thoroughly approve of Pomella. …
Pomella has some of the best Middle Eastern food in the Bay Area: the best hummus I’ve ever had, excellent falafel, and delicious, fresh salads. Highly recommended!-Irv

We missed Ba-Bite so much and we are so happy now that Pomella is open! Same delicious food with lots of exciting new options every week. Especially loving the rotation of desserts made with seasonal fruit!

I was bummed when Ba Bite closed but Pomella is the same great food in an even better location. Everything I’ve had is delicious, and it’s the perfect spot for safe takeout and even outdoor dining during COVID.

Pomella delivers delicious and nutritious meals that do not disappoint. Love how they've made online ordering and COVID-safe pickup easy.  Also appreciate the new options to adjust menu items for those of us who need to be dairy-free.

Awesome desserts at Pomella! I ordered the rainbow cookies for Pride weekend and the Rugelach. Both were so amazing and fresh. Also got beer to-go cans- they have a great selection. Super easy or order online and pick up! I love the weekly …
Very good and authentic Israeli food. Love the variety of all the small appetizers and large and small plates. Highly recommend.
Excellent food. Wonderful unusual salads and hot dishes, delicious authentic humus, great desserts. Very easy to order online and pick up. Highly recommended.
Excellent food and service. Organic ingredients with creative flair. Highly recommended.
The hummus and pita chips are absolutely amazing, and fresh!  Honestly can't wait to come back for more.

Mika puts her love - and skills - into all her food.  I love the majederah! I have mine with lamb. All the salads are delicious and refreshing. Don’t forget the pita and hummus! One visit to her store and you’ll be hooked! Now more than ever, support your local, independent merchants!

Pomella is a v2 upgrade of Ba-Bite. Mica's food is so fresh. Her hummus is luscious. Enjoy fresh daily pita, feta cheese stuffed falafel, wraps, and tagines. Cray-cray good dessert specials rotate. I don't know how Mica always chooses the …

I have always supported Mica and Pomella, formerly Ba-Bite, for the delicious quality food that is prepared and served. Since COVID I order by phone and pick up food bi-weekly from them. The chomas is delicious as is the milky (think po’ de …
WE MISSED YOU! Love the food here. The hummus is absolutely divine. Thanks for providing delicious and nutritious food <3
Pomella is a gem! Wonderful Middle Eastern food...and mouth watering deserts! (Rugelach, Babka Bread Pudding, Blueberry Cake...)

Pomella is a dream come true! I’ve lived in the neighborhood for 6+ years and when Ba-Bite, our go-to restaurant, closed down a few years back, we were so bummed. I’d been craving my favorite salad since the day they closed (arugula & …
Amazing Middle Eastern food

We were huge fans of Mica's food back at Ba-Bite, and were THRILLED when we learned she was opening Pomella. The food is just as excellent as we remembered, with fresh ingredients and interesting flavors. We especially love the salads, …

So glad to have Mica and her team back on Piedmont Ave again. The food at her new shared space is every but as good as before (best falafel in town and the beet/romaine salad is one of my go-tos ) with new items appearing regularly. Easy online ordering and pickup.
Wonderful food and business.  Always exactly what we need.  So glad Pomella is here with us.
Good food! Fast pick up and easy to order online!
Mica and her team make delicious food.  Vibrant and authentic flavors that comfort and satisfy.   The hummus is the best I have tasted in the U.S.
Great food and convenient pick-up.  I also enjoy their weekly emails outlining what's in season and new on the menu.  Definitely planning on ordering again soon.

Ordered to-go a little while ago, and it was excellent. Reheating instructions were clear, and the food was delicious. I had the lamb kefta, the chicken tagine, hummus, and shakshuka. All were fantastic.
Best middle eastern food outside of the Middle East!  Everything is delicious but you can’t beat Mica’s hummus.  Delivery makes it super convenient too!

Pomella stands for Excellent food.  The saffron rice with salmon is my favorite here.  It’s hard to decide between the chicken Tagine, Majadra Plate,  Veggie Tagine Couscous knowing the Saffron Rice with Salmon always win. The Mezze  side …

Pomella solidly deserves a top spot on the short list of good things in 2020. I’ve enjoyed about 60% of their menu (sans alcohol) and have always marveled at their flavorful and fresh offerings. Wonderful food, lovely staff and a passionate proprietor! 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽
Delicious food!
New favorite restaurant on Piedmont Ave. I am so happy that we have a wonderful new Mediterranean/Israeli food place in our neighborhood.

Nice venue with plenty of seating both indoor and outdoor, friendly staff, and some of the most delicious food I have ever had the pleasure of eating. You are doing a disservice to yourself if you don’t eat here.
Mica is so welcoming and friendly.  This along with the amazing food make for a special experience. One of my new favorites!
